import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import data from '../data' import HomeScreen from './HomeScreen'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.product.find(x => x._id === props.match.params.id); if (!product) { return
Товар не найден!
; } return (
